title: why is vi popular all of a sudden???
body: getting a little tired of seeing her 9 out of 10 games

replies.body:
Getting a little bit tired of people exaggerating champion popularity. In your last 20 games, vi has been in 5 of them.

{{champion:99}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:37}} have appeared with the same frequency in your games.

She might be popular because immobile ADC's are popular atm.

She was already considered quite strong after her last buff, not sure if that contributed to her being kicked back into the meta.

But right now the ADC's are Twitch, Jhin, Varus, and Cait.

All quite immobile, except cait's E, but honestly that won't do much.
No, it's not. He doesn't have a reliable escape or dash.

She can built as a super tank and does massive damage.  She has a gap closer, tank,dmg, decent clear path, and CC ult that is a instant death to whoever gets ult by her.  
  The main reason is because she can lock down just about anyone and has enough stuns,roots, etc for easy kills for either her or her lanes.  
  CC/Stuns/roots/slows are pretty much League of Legends now so if your a jungler say ( wukong) you won't win many games unless you're very skilled with him but the point is CC. 
-Just my thoughts.
Courage of the Colossus + {{champion:254}} = too good.
Point n Click HARD cc UNINTERRUPTABLE ult. High damage with just warriors and triforce, while being tanky as fk with courage and passive. I can go on and on.
